data.text: @TipBetPro @westaustralian Does any go and get a flu vaccine and actively set out to get it?

@mag_down_under2 @westaustralian Vaccine immunity against serious illness begins to wane (albeit slowly) after 4 months. I find it really odd that you can't comprehend why people would want to catch a virus they will almost certainly get anyway whilst they have maximum immunity.

@westaustralian This is analogous to fools chasing syphilis, small pox, polio, yellow fever, dysentery, cholera, Ebola or any number of other deadly or debilitating diseases in the past. Vaccines and other modern medications eradicated most of these diseases and we should be eternally grateful.
@TipBetPro @westaustralian I’ve heard that he’s also involved with ANZCA, a shadowy organisation intent on administering drugs to the population on a daily basis.. @drajm
@westaustralian I find it really odd that someone wants to go out and get infected with a virus
@westaustralian Yes I’ve seen one anti vaxxer come out and asking for someone who’s got it to have a party.

@westaustralian Can't read this as behind a paywall but the fact extremist OzSage rep Andrew Miller is quoted is alarming. Evidence suggests the vast majority of us will catch covid. Surely it would be beneficial to catch in the period when vaccination immunity against serious illness is highest
